item.title: Yeezus
item.description: Controversial, Non-commercial The ye movement has gone intergalactic where it transcends the man. It’s no longer about a single album, song, or episode of keeping up with the Kardashians. As much as it could be said that Kanye became a sell out to the music industry that made him the inspirational artist, his following lost sight of the fact that it stopped being about Grammys or Platinum albums when everyone kept classifying him as just an “artist”.
